1.content:
Welcome to The Dragon Training Academy!
Where Training dragons is done.
No matter what species, even the hard dragons can be trained.

What do you want to play or write stories as?
1.title: Welcome To Any Dragon Training Academy!

11.title: A Httyd Character from Book and Franchise

choices: A lead on Dagur the Deranged's whereabouts.
115.content: Heather woke up before dawn one morning and quickly saddled Windshear. Today, they headed to a new island in search of something. What was it?
115.title: Heather's Story part 1

choices: Heather must win at arm wrestling for the information.
Heather must win a belching contest for the information.
1151.content: Mjolnir Island was the last island that Dagur was seen at in recent months. Someone there would've known where he intended to strike next. Windshear made the trip by nightfall and landed her rider before the local tavern.Heather looked tough enough that, in addition to owning a dragon, few wanted to give her trouble. Her informant was less talkative however and had to be persuaded. How?
1151.title: A lead on Dagur the Deranged's whereabouts.

11511.content: "You want information? You gotta earn it." Heather's informant said as he put his powerful arm on the table. She gave him her usual cocky smirk and mimicked him. Their hands clasped and they counted down: "one...two...three...go!"
11511.title: Heather must win at arm wrestling for the infor...

12.title: Any Dragon of the Five classes

121.title: Stoker

choices: A Hybrid Dragon of Two different classes of Dragons
125.content: How about these classes of Dragons?
125.title: Other Classes

info.brief_description: Join Hiccup and The Riders and Dragons of all types of HTTYD Franchises.
info.description:
In Your stories, Hiccup and Toothless are back.
I present you an all new Interactive story.
With new dragons, new enemies and so much more.

Rules:
1. No TF Stories of Humans becoming Dragons or Dragons becoming Humans.
2. No Vore or Gore.
3. Original species of Dragons are welcome in this.
4. No Deaths.
5. Old enemies are welcome.
6. Train any dragon.
7. Play as any character.
8. Characters and Dragons from Rescue Riders are allowed.
9. Elements from the book series are welcome.
10. No Inflations of any type or weight gain.
11. Welcome To Dragon Training Academy!
